amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace the language in the bill concerning minimum capital levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-254 to give the newly created regulator (FHFA) greater authority to impose capital strictures on GSEs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Leach amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 36 - 378 (Roll no. 542).
